title.rendered: Call a Jet goes to Mexico!

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text uncode_shortcode_id=”135849″]We have great news: Call a Jet has opened its new office in Mexico:[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image media=”121459″ media_width_percent=”50″ media_ratio=”three-two” uncode_shortcode_id=”986273″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/1″][vc_column_text uncode_shortcode_id=”206814″]Are you ready to visit this beautiful country? Book your flight now! Here are our top 3 hotel picks to enjoy your stay:[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image media=”121486″ media_width_percent=”100″ media_ratio=”three-two” uncode_shortcode_id=”206751″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image media=”121477″ media_width_percent=”100″ media_ratio=”three-two” uncode_shortcode_id=”955627″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/1″][vc_column_text uncode_shortcode_id=”170013″]La Casita

Cabo San Lucas

Freshly off a total renovation, our beloved Seaside La Casita is even more spectacular. As a sophisticated Los Cabos luxury villa, it’s a contemporary interpretation of Spanish architecture overlooking the Sea of Cortez, where whales migrate and waves punctuate along the cliffs. Indoor-outdoor living is emphasized throughout, with south-facing views and maximum sunlight, radiant sunsets, and uninterrupted views.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image media=”121518″ media_width_percent=”100″ media_ratio=”three-two” uncode_shortcode_id=”620885″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image media=”121509″ media_width_percent=”100″ media_ratio=”three-two” uncode_shortcode_id=”186090″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/1″][vc_column_text uncode_shortcode_id=”124706″]Villa Zama

Tulum

Villa Zama holds a wonderful position within the exclusive Aldea Zama neighbourhood of trendy Tulum. Most, if not all, homes built in Aldea Zama are constructed with sustainability in mind and the tropical retreat of Villa Zama is no different. The architecturally designed home showcases indoor-outdoor living and makes the ultimate retreat for those in search of comfort and tranquillity.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image media=”121537″ media_width_percent=”100″ media_ratio=”three-two” uncode_shortcode_id=”163627″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image media=”121546″ media_width_percent=”100″ media_ratio=”three-two” uncode_shortcode_id=”169538″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/1″][vc_column_text uncode_shortcode_id=”128781″]Villa Kaa Nah

Playa Del Carmen

With surroundings this beautiful, a villa shouldn’t try and compete, merely complement. And that’s precisely what the exquisite Villa Kaa Nah does. This five-bedroom villa provides sublime comfort enhanced by the verdant gardens and the tropical surroundings of Playacar. It’s just minutes from the white sands and azure water of Playa del Carmen’s finest beach. Explore the natural and cultural delights of the region.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/1″][vc_single_image media=”121567″ media_width_percent=”100″ uncode_shortcode_id=”131493″][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: We have great news: Call a Jet has opened its new office in Mexico! Are you ready to visit this beautiful country? Book your flight now! Here are our top 3 hotel picks to enjoy your stay.
